be.ac.ulb.gpib
Class GPIBDeviceIdentifier

java.lang.Object
  be.ac.ulb.gpib.GPIBDevice
      be.ac.ulb.gpib.GPIBDeviceIdentifier

public final class GPIBDeviceIdentifier
extends GPIBDevice

Used to identify every GPIB present on the bus. One can get an instance of a given device via its identifer using the getDevice() method

Author:
Jean-Michel DRICOT changed by Ralf Tralow

addDevice

public static void addDevice(java.lang.String _name,
                             int _address,
                             GPIBDriver _driver,
                             int _controllerNumber,
                             int _controllerSpeed)
Adds a valid GPIB device present on local system.

Parameters:
_name - the name of the device. It is the string returned by the IEEE488.2 command: "IDN?"
_address - the GPIB address of the device
_driver - the driver who will be used to access this device
_controllerNumber - the _controller number
_controllerSpeed - the _controller speed

getName

public java.lang.String getName()
Gets the name.

Returns:
the name

initialize

public static void initialize(java.lang.String driverName,
                              boolean getIDN)
Takes care of reading GPIB properties file for local system and find out which driver should be used to access GPIB devices.
It also calls finally the initialize() method of the Driver.

Parameters:
driverName - the driver name
getIDN - the get idn
